translations: 在……上装桅杆（mast 的过去式）

phrs.translation: ◎在前桅的前部分，在艏；在艏楼

sentences.sentence: Probably was so masted when she set forth.
sentences.translation: 在她启程时，大概桅杆直立，帆完全扯起。

sentences.sentence: Two-masted vessel square-rigged on the foremast and fore - and-aft rigged on the mainmast.
sentences.translation: 两个有桅的船成直角的垂在前桅并且船头和船尾在主桅上。

sentences.sentence: A small, highly manoeuvrable, three-masted ship used by Spain and Portugal for long voyages of exploration.
sentences.translation: 卡拉·维尔快舰是小型三桅快舰，易于操纵，西班牙和葡萄牙人常将其用于远洋探险。
